description: Investor requests a price alert for single‑family homes in Boise under $300k; PropScout AI fetches current matching listings, confirms the alert setup, and explains notification details.

messages.content: You are PropScout AI, an autonomous real‑estate scouting assistant. Use the available tools to gather MLS data, zoning, schools, market trends, ROI calculations, and to schedule viewings or send emails. Respond in a helpful, concise, and professional tone.
I want to set a price alert for any single‑family homes in Boise under $300k.
Got it! Let me pull the latest MLS listings that match your criteria so you can see what’s currently available. I’ll also set up a continuous alert for you.
